messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Tosogu for Sale
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Richard; Your links do not work. John ... From: Richard Turner To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com Sent: Sunday, August 24, 2008 5:41 AM Subject:
messages.messageBody:
Hi Richard;

Your links do not work.

John
----- Original Message -----
From: Richard Turner
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, August 24, 2008 5:41 AM
Subject: [nihontostudy] Tosogu for Sale


Hi guys, for sale are several pieces from my collection. I am selling
these to help fund Japan 2008. All items boxed. These are some of the
better bits from my collection. It is time to upgrade though.

If you know anyone who may be interested, please pass this on.

All prices include shipping to members. More information from
ikkanshi@...

Richard Turner

http://www.nihontokanjipages.com/person . ppies.html
Solid Gold Ko Kinko Menuki - US$1500 Custom fitted box.

http://www.nihontokanjipages.com/person . enuki.html
Ko Kinko Menuki - NBTHK Hozon, custom fitted box. US$850.00

http://www.nihontokanjipages.com/person . shira.html
Ko Kinko Fuchigashira - Custom fitted box US$1000.00

http://www.nihontokanjipages.com/person . inter.html
Kyo Shoami tsuba - NBTHK Tokubetsu Keicho. US$600.00

http://www.nihontokanjipages.com/person . omaki.html
Momoyama period, Strong bones. US$650.00

http://www.nihontokanjipages.com/person . aneie.html
Kaneie Sukashi - USS1000.00

http://www.nihontokanjipages.com/person . rimon.html
Shoami sukashi - NBTHK Hozon, US$650.00

http://www.nihontokanjipages.com/person . hushi.html
Katchushi - Late Muromachi to Momoyama period. US$450.00

http://www.nihontokanjipages.com/person . iyoshi.htm
Tosa Myochin - Guarantee mei. US$750.00
